body.description: Get a super green clean! This best-selling wash is a fave for one reason: it works wonders! Super green phytonutrients including kale, seaweed and blue seakale support in cleansing and removing makeup, toxins and impurities from the skin both day and night. It's like a big fat detox juice for your skin.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Sea Foam Complete Face Wash Kale Detox Deep Face Wash Coconut Milk Cream to Foam Face Wash Rose Kombucha Flower Powered Face Wash Vegan Ceramide Extra Gentle Face Wash Glow Baby Brightening Face Wash Benefit: Foaming cleanser with advanced marine phytonutrients gently cleanses & brightens skin leaving face feeling refreshed & balanced Phytonutrients including kale, seaweed, and blue seakale support in cleansing and detoxing impurities from the skin Cream to foam face wash helps lift dirt, makeup and debris to the surface so you can wash it away. A go-to in your skin's age-fighting arsenal that distresses & cleanses Disobey time with the help of powerhouse antioxidants that gently cleanses & balances skin leaving it feeling refreshed & luminous Super gentle face wash uses vegan ceramides to support your skin's barrier with marshmallow root extract & calendula to help calm & soothe Powered by AHA and Vitamin C to help exfoliate, brighten and even out your skin tone Why You'll Love It: Remove makeup, cleanse & tone Support in cleansing and removing makeup, toxins and impurities from the skin Help lift dirt, makeup and debris to the surface so you can wash it away Gently remove makeup, oil and impurities with this light foaming cleanser Support & replenish your skin barrier Brightens skin tone through gentle exfoliation Skin Type: All skin types Oily & blemish prone skin types All skin types, especially stressed All skin types Sensitive Skin All Skin Types Scent: Coconut Kale & Green Juice Coconut & Vanilla Rose Fragrance Free Orange & Vanilla Formulated Without: Parabens, Phthalates, SLS, Sulfates, or Mineral Oil Parabens, Phthalates, SLS, Sulfates, or Mineral Oil Parabens, Phthalates, SLS, Sulfates, or Mineral Oil Parabens, Phthalates, SLS, Sulfates, or Mineral Oil Parabens, Phthalates, SLS, Sulfates, or Mineral Oil Parabens, Phthalates, SLS, Sulfates, or Mineral Oil

About Pacifica Beauty Made with Compassion: Pacifica Beauty is an innovative clean beauty company that started a revolution in natural beauty. We are committed to using natural ingredients that are skin beneficial, non-toxic and safe. Our product range includes skin care, color cosmetics, hair care, body and perfume. for the Planet, Nature is our muse. For nearly 25 years, we have strived to do right by our planet, from the ingredients we source to the pretty packages we create. We make it easy for our community to help the environment too. Animals, We have been Cruelty-Free and Vegan since day one. These are not buzzwords for us. We are fearless in our mission to transform beauty by leading with love and compassion. and You! You should not have to choose between effective or clean, beauty or health, self or environment. We create clean products across all categories that are accessible and make you feel beautiful. No need to compromise.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Makeup remover, fresh face, gentle cleanser and natural ingredients
reviews.reviewText: I love this product and have been purchasing it for years. I have very sensitive skin and this facial cleanser has been a life saver. The natural ingredients don’t make my skin feel irritated. I use a small quarter sized amount in the mornings when washing my face and a little additional at night if I’m washing my makeup off. It has a great scent and smells very fresh and natural. It’s hydrating my face unlike the competitors that just dry out the skin in hopes of removing the blemishes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a real good quality face wash. It removes all makeup and I love how fresh my face looks after using it. My new favorite.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This Is The Only Face Wash I Use
reviews.reviewText: I bought it on Amazon instead of going to Ulta to get some, but I have been exclusively using this face wash for several years. It works wonders on my oily, whitehead-prone skin. I don’t use it every day to avoid drying my face out too much.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been using this face wash for 4-5 years and have been really happy with it. I’m able to get all my makeup off and get my faces cleaned in one step. I finish it off with my Greek oil and my face is feeling clean and refreshed. The only fault I give is that if I don’t use my Greek oil after it does leave my skin feeling a little dry. But I think that’s just how it goes with face wash and for me personally I like to make sure my face is nice and clean and replenish with natural oil.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 15, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not 100% for sensitive skin
reviews.reviewText: I’m not sure if the product was suppose to leave me rashes and dry parts on my face and that was it’s way of “exfoliating”. The smell is ok, but I really tried giving this a better chance so even with my dry skin caused by this I kept using it and I think I must say my skin got use to it? Not sure if I’m doing good on still using it after dry patches on my face.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This stuff is clean and amazing 😍
reviews.reviewText: It's hard finding a face wash that won't break me out . And less harmful products. This stuff is amazing and smells good 💯 will be buying again

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great face wash. Removes all makeup, even the heavy stuff, without drying out your skin terribly. Can’t ask for more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Gentle face wash that works. The product is not tested on animal wich is an extra bonus.

Liebe!Richtig gutes Waschgel. Kriegt jedes makeup ganz einfach runter, fühlt sich angenehm an und trocknet die Haut nicht zu sehr aus (habe empfindliche mischhaut). Gibt es hier leider nicht immer deshalb versuche ich zuzuschlagen wenn es verfügbar ist. Habe es leider noch nirgendwo anders gefunden zum bestellen.

I did a lot of research before buying this because I was looking for a face wash to take off makeup that didn't have silicones, alcohol or sulfates and this checks all the boxes. This company is great, they use all natural ingredients. I've been using this for a while now to wash off makeup and it gets everything off. It's definitely only for combination/oily skin types though because it's a bit drying.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on May 5, 2020
reviews.reviewText: I love the product, thank you! :)
I will definitely buy this product again and highly recommend it .
Removes makeup well. Vegan and cruelty free.
